titles.title: Father In Heaven, How We Love You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father in heaven, how we love You.
We lift Your Name in all the earth
May your kingdom be established in our praises,
As Your people declare Your mighty worth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Blessed be the Lord God Almighty,
Who was, and is, and is to come.
Blessed be the Lord God Almighty,
Who reigns forever more.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Padre en los cielos, Te adoramos.
En la tierra tu nombre proclamamos.
Que tu reino se establezca en adorarte,
Y tu pueblo proclame tu poder.
